cookies.message: We use cookies to enchance your user experience. By using our website you agree to our use of cookies.

about.title: Hi, I'm Jakub!
about.message: I am a computer science student at the Warsaw University of Life Sciences (SGGW). I am passionate about programming and see my future in this field. My main interests lie in web development and machine learning. I am eager to learn and grow in these areas, and I am excited about the opportunities they present.

projects.title: Projects
projects.descriptA: Simple project without backend. Made using plain JavaScript.
projects.descriptB: More complicated project made using React. Still no backend.
projects.descriptC: Complicated project with backend written in django.
